title: 207 - Defeat Burnout & Get Stoked Out of Your Mind About Making Stuff Again!
description:
Guys I'm a little bit burnout. This year has been incredible career wise, but also completely and utterly exhausting.

I'm not a stranger to burnout, but this latest experience has taught me something brand new about about it. I think this lesson is a game changer and we dive into it and more in this episode.

If you're tired, hopeless or you've just about lost your ability to care about creativity at all anymore, this episode is for you. If you're burnout, fed up, exhausted or blocked creatively, it's my hope that this episode is a gift that relights your excitement and enthusiasm for making stuff again!!

NEW SHOP STUFF!!!
creativepeptalk.etsy.com

CREDITS

Thanks to Yoni Wolf and the band WHY? for our theme music.

Thanks to Alex Sugg for editing and the podcast!
www.alexsugg.com
